original: Rūpaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
analyzed: rūpam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā ati
corrected: rūpam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti

original: matthaluṅgaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
analyzed: etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā ati
corrected: matthaluṅgaṁ etaṁ mama eso aham asmi eso me attā iti

original: mettaṁ cetovimuttiṁ etaṁ mama …
analyzed: mā idtam cetaḥ vimuttim etam mama
corrected: mettaṁ cetovimuttiṁ etaṁ mama

original: Aparantānudiṭṭhiyā catucattālīsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
analyzed: catucattālīsāya ākārehi abhinivesaḥ hoti
corrected: Aparantānudiṭṭhiyā catucattālīsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti

original: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo;
analyzed: seyyathā api telappadīpassa jhāyataḥ saḥ vaṇṇo
corrected: seyyathā api telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so vaṇṇo

original: ayaṁ paṭhamā saṅkhāravatthukā attānudiṭṭhi.
analyzed: ayam paṭhamā saṅkhāra vatthukā
corrected: ayam paṭhamā saṅkhāra vatthukā attānudiṭṭhi

original: Imasmiñca pana attani ime saṅkhārā”ti.
analyzed: imasmin ca pana ime saṅkhārā ati
corrected: imasmin ca pana attani ime saṅkhārā ti

analyzed: ayam catutthā saṅkhāra vatthukā
corrected: ayam catutthā saṅkhāra vatthukā attānudiṭṭhi

original: Evamevaṁ idhekacco vedanaṁ …pe…

original: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—

corrected: na eva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā ti
